attributes.background: Let students were trainers for school as they are more comfortable and will help the students athletic abilities as they will not be in pain with school shoes.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. Decisions about whether to require students to wear particular types of shoes as part of their school uniform are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Require schools to make uniform optional: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259
